definition: to excuse sb/to exempt/to remove or dismiss from office/to avoid/to avert/to escape/to be prohibited
to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid

sentences.english: Hands-free phones are not much safer than hand-held phone sets.
sentences.chinese: 免提电话并不比手持电话的安全度高出多少。

sentences.english: My handsfree cell phone allows me to do this no matter where I am.
sentences.chinese: 免提手机使我能够这样去做，不管我在哪里。

sentences.english: Another cool feature of this is the voice activation for hands free phones.
sentences.chinese: 另外一个很酷的特色就是免提电话语音激活。

sentences.english: Some of the car handsfree functions do not work.
sentences.chinese: 我的手机和车载免提装置不连接。

sentences.english: It's called a stereo portable handsfree because it's for more than listening.
sentences.chinese: 这就是所谓的立体声便携免提装置，因为它比听的。

sentences.english: Don't use a speaker phone unless absolutely necessary.
sentences.chinese: 若非必要，不要使用电话的免提功能。

sentences.english: Even hands-free use has been shown to increase the risk of accidents.
sentences.chinese: 即使是免提的使用已被证实会增加意外的风险。

sentences.english: It offers such features as hands-free telephone dialing and a collision-mitigation braking system.
sentences.chinese: 它的额外配置有免提拨号和撞击缓冲刹车系统。

sentences.english: It's good to know the 8700r sports Bluetooth and integrated speakerphone for handsfree operation.
sentences.chinese: 它的好，知道来袭体育蓝牙和集成扬声器为免提操作。

sentences.english: Experts say people who are concerned about mobile phones can take steps like using a wired head-set.
sentences.chinese: 专家说那些关心的是像手机可以采取措施用免提装置。

sentences.english: You could use a hands-free device or an earphone.
sentences.chinese: 可以使用免提设备或者耳机。

sentences.english: Connecting an ear piece or switching on speakerphone will reduce radiation exposure.
sentences.chinese: 耳机通话和免提都可以减少辐射。

sentences.english: This Bluetooth-enabled in-car hands-free system lets you make and receive calls without having to fiddle around with your mobile phone.
sentences.chinese: 此款车载蓝牙免提系统可以使你的移动电话接打自如。

sentences.english: Speakerphone calls had a bit of distortion.
